note.string: Any {C/Mage} can be played on the leftmost position. If you don't own {P/Demiurge Luna} or {P/Regina}, try choosing a {C/Mage} with {B/BT_ACTION_GAUGE} like {P/Roxie}.

note_jp.string: どの{C/Mage}でも最左に配置可能。{P/Demiurge Luna}や{P/Regina}を持っていない場合は、{P/Roxie}のような{B/BT_ACTION_GAUGE}持ちの{C/Mage}を選択。

note_kr.string: 어떤 {C/Mage}든 가장 왼쪽 위치에 배치 가능. {P/Demiurge Luna}나 {P/Regina}가 없다면 {P/Roxie}처럼 {B/BT_ACTION_GAUGE}를 가진 {C/Mage}를 선택.

note_zh.string: 任何{C/Mage}都可以放在最左侧。如果没有{P/Demiurge Luna}或{P/Regina}，可以选择像{P/Roxie}这样拥有{B/BT_ACTION_GAUGE}的{C/Mage}。

note.string: Any {C/Mage} can be played on the leftmost position. If you don't own {P/Demiurge Luna} or {P/Regina}, try choosing a {C/Mage} with {B/BT_ACTION_GAUGE} like {P/Roxie}.

note_jp.string: どの{C/Mage}でも最左に配置可能。{P/Demiurge Luna}や{P/Regina}を持っていない場合は、{P/Roxie}のような{B/BT_ACTION_GAUGE}持ちの{C/Mage}を選択。

note_kr.string: 어떤 {C/Mage}든 가장 왼쪽 위치에 배치 가능. {P/Demiurge Luna}나 {P/Regina}가 없다면 {P/Roxie}처럼 {B/BT_ACTION_GAUGE}를 가진 {C/Mage}를 선택.

note_zh.string: 任何{C/Mage}都可以放在最左侧。如果没有{P/Demiurge Luna}或{P/Regina}，可以选择像{P/Roxie}这样拥有{B/BT_ACTION_GAUGE}的{C/Mage}。
